summary: A cameraman is given a week to photograph the aerial highlights of Holland for a travelogue.
cast: Sanny Day|Pia Beck|Wam Heskes|Greet Vogels|Audrey Hepburn|A. Viruly|Louisa Barkey|Siny Bikker|Bill Kuyper|Pieter Zellmann|Harry Bierman|Wim Booker|Han Bentz van den Berg|Frances May|Tineke Goldman|Els Boon|Jan Glastra van Loon|Magda Janssens|Francien Sanders|Wilmy Martin Muller
director: Directors: Charles Huguenot van der Linden, Heinz Josephson
title: Nederlands in zeven lessen
